      • getMnistExample

        public static Pair<org.jblas.DoubleMatrix,org.jblas.DoubleMatrix> getMnistExample(int example)
                                                                           throws IOException
        Gets an mnist example as an input, label pair. Keep in mind the return matrix for out come is a 1x1 matrix. If you need multiple labels, remember to convert to a zeros with 1 as index of the label for the output training vector.
        Parameters:
        example - the example to get
        Returns:
        the image,label pair
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getMnistExampleBatches

        public List<Pair<org.jblas.DoubleMatrix,org.jblas.DoubleMatrix>> getMnistExampleBatches(int batchSize,
                                                                               int numBatches)
                                                                                 throws IOException
        Gets an mnist example as an input, label pair. Keep in mind the return matrix for out come is a 1x1 matrix. If you need multiple labels, remember to convert to a zeros with 1 as index of the label for the output training vector.
        Parameters:
        example - the example to get
        batchSize - the batch size of examples to get
        Returns:
        the image,label pair
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getMnistExampleBatch

        public static Pair<org.jblas.DoubleMatrix,org.jblas.DoubleMatrix> getMnistExampleBatch(int batchSize)
                                                                                throws IOException
        Gets an mnist example as an input, label pair. Keep in mind the return matrix for out come is a 1x1 matrix. If you need multiple labels, remember to convert to a zeros with 1 as index of the label for the output training vector.
        Parameters:
        example - the example to get
        batchSize - the batch size of examples to get
        Returns:
        the image,label pair
        Throws:
        IOException
